title: LHMC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 123 Senior Resident Posts
description: The Lady Hardinge Medical College (LHMC) has officially released the notification to fill 123 Senior Resident Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their BDS, Diploma, Post-graduation, MBBS, MDS, DNB, and Post-graduation can apply for the LHMC Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age lim...
